short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to save timestamps in YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Bookmarker is a must-have Chrome extension for avid YouTube users who want to save and organize specific timestamps within videos. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and searching for that important moment in a lengthy video. With YouTube Bookmarker, you can effortlessly mark and save timestamps, making it a breeze to revisit your favorite parts, important discussions, educational segments, or funny moments.
